title: I built a Laptop
description: Who needs Apple or Razer when you can build your OWN laptop Why the PS5 is LOSING Money:  Fast Food Tier List:  I sold my body on Amazon.com:  The Pocket Gaming PC - GPD Win3:   Reddit is Killing GameStop    Check out Austin on Twitch:  Vibe with Matt on Twitch:  Chill with Ken on Twitch:    Subscribe!  Twitter:  Matt:  Instagram:
